text: Qala i Naw (قلعه نو) is a town in Qala i Naw District and the capital of Badghis Province, of north-west Afghanistan. Its population is estimated 9,000 in 2006. It has a small airport, Qala i Naw Airport. ==References== Category:Cities in Afghanistan Category:Badghis Province
title: Qala e Naw
